function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in indoor spaces leading to the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and infection among individuals in enclosed spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, using HEPA filters, and promoting outdoor activities","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C air purifiers, and air quality monitoring systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to social distancing and mask-wearing guidelines","Impact":"Higher likelihood of virus transmission in public spaces and workplaces","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict social distancing measures, promoting mask-wearing, and implementing crowd control strategies","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring systems, thermal cameras, and contactless access controls","People":"General public, workers, and visitors to public places","Owner":"Government authorities, employers, and event organizers"},{"Description":"Poor hygiene and sanitization practices in shared environments","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission and contamination in communal areas","Mitigation":"Promoting hand hygiene, regular disinfection of high-touch surfaces, and installing touchless facilities","Technologies":"Touchless faucets, automatic hand sanitizer dispensers, and UV-C disinfection devices","People":"Residents of shared facilities, visitors to public spaces, and building maintenance staff","Owner":"Property managers, facility maintenance providers, and local health departments"}]}
